attributes.action: urge the Serious Fraud Office to release into the public domain information held relating to Equitable Life.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Serious Fraud Office has stated that it does hold such information, but has refused release on the grounds that it might prejudice a future prosecution. However the SFO has held this information for several years, has not brought any prosecution and has actually stated that it does not intend to prosecute.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
